title: Rare And Unseen Pictures Of Shahrukh Khan, Katrina Kaif, Anushka Sharma From Jab Tak Hai Jaan Days
text:
Posted by: Puri Updated: Monday, October 19, 2015, 17:53 [IST] 
Shahrukh Khan , Katrina Kaif and Anushka Sharma worked together for the first time in Yash Chopra's Jab Tak Hai Jaan . We bring to you some rare and unseen pictures of Shahrukh, Katrina and Anushka from the shooting and promotions of the film. Yash Chopra returned to direction with Jab Tak Hai Jaan after taking a gap of eight years. Before Jab Tak Hai Jaan , Yash Chopra directed Shahrukh in Veer Zara . Despite receiving mixed reviews from the critics Shahrukh's movie was a superhit both in India and in overseas.Not many people know that for the first time Shahrukh Khan agreed to kiss his on screen heroine i.e Katrina Kaif in Jab Tak Hai Jaan . The actor has a strict no kissing clause mentioned in his contract. Finally! Deepika Padukone Talks About Her Fight With Shahrukh Khan Two weeks before Jab Tak Hai Jaan' s release, Ajay Devgn, whose Son Of Sardaar w as also releasing on the same date, sent a notice to the Competition Commission of India accusing Yash Raj Films. The notice said that they used their dominant position to secure many desirable single-screen theatres for their release.Fortunately, both Ajay Devgn and Shahrukh Khan's film performed very well at the Box office.
